about_the_game:
Whether you're a beginner or looking to polish your English skills, EnglishVan is your perfect companion on the road to fluency. Start your journey today and transform the way you learn languages!

EnglishVan is created by a native English speaker.

Extensive Vocabulary: Dive into a rich database of over 20,000 English words, ensuring comprehensive language coverage.

Multiple Game Modes: Choose from three exciting game modes, each crafted to enhance your learning experience and keep you engaged.

Contextual Learning: Each word comes with clear definitions and example sentences, helping you understand and remember vocabulary in context.

Interactive Quizzes: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions that challenge your memory and reinforce your learning.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a smooth and intuitive gaming experience, designed to make learning enjoyable and accessible for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: Embark on an educational adventure with EnglishVan, the engaging application designed to supercharge your English language learning journey! Tailored for language enthusiasts and learners, EnglishVan offers a fun and interactive way to master English language vocabulary.
supported_languages: French, Italian, German, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Filipino, Hindi, Traditional Chinese
